pullrequest.title: Convert opende libraries to be static and not installed (->default)

content.raw: I was trying to avoid conflicts in the case of someone have installed ode in the system and tries to make use of a program mixing gazebo and some ode features. Symbol collision ending up in weird segfaults (like the one we had with urdfdom and sdformat) is what I was trying to avoid hidden the full copy of our ode library inside gazebo_physics_ode. Maybe have a clear use case (an example mixing gazebo and ode) as example could help us to think in the proper solution.
